widesha rakiya niyojitha aayathana sadaha balapathra laba ganima.wishrama watup, se. a. a., se. ni. bha. a. saha wenathsewaka artha sadhaka aramudala aapasu laba dimasiwil wishrama watup kramayawandambau / wandambau purusha ha anathdaru wishrama watup kramaya.rajya sewa arthasadhaka aramudala.widesha wishrama watup sthira wisa labagena wenath ratakata sankramanaya kirimedi prathilabha laba ganimawiwahaya matha sewayen wishrama ganimedi sewaka artha sadhaka aramudal laba ganima.rajaye ho palath palana sewaye sthira ha wishrama watup sahitha thanathurakata path wu pasu prathilabha muda harima.madhyawedi wishrama watup kramaya.wandambau sthrinta ha wandambau purushayanta ha anath daru wishrama watup kramaya wyaparaya wasa damima, rajayata pawara ganima, janatha santhaka kirima, awasthawanhidi sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal laba ganimahamuda sewaye niyuthu wu aya sandaha wishrama watup sewaka arthasadhaka aramudala samajikaya miya yaman pasu aramudala laba ganima.sthira aabadhayak nisa sewayen wishrama ganimasamanya wishramika padi piliwela	krushikarmaya, pashu sampath saha dhiwaraanumathiya saha liyapadinchiyabalapathrabanku, badu saha rakshanabanku ginumnayapudgalayinge liyapadinchi kirimpurawasi bhawayaupath sanniwedanaya saha madhyathapal sewathorathuru sewaadhyapanaya saha puhunuwapasal adhyapanayausas adhyapanaya saha wshwa widyala adhyapanayaparisarayaparisara sanrakshanaya saha wadasatahankalaguna sewa saukhya, suwathawa saha samaja sewasaukhya anugrahayalama rakshanayaniwasa, depala saha yatithala pahasukamniwasa saha depalasalasum kirima saha godanagili regulasiyukthiya, nithiya saha ayithiwasikamparibhogika aarakshanayawyawasthadayakaya saha widhayakaya welanda, wyapara saha karmanthakarmantha liyapadinchiyaaayathana liyapadinchiyacharika kirima, sancharaya saha wiwekayacharika kirimaprawahanaya apawa amathanna
maranaya ena thuru susum lana gahanu minissu nam degolloma dakala thiyenawa.

ma watuna kshanikayenma nawathath nagita thawath mitar kihipayak diwagos thrasthrawadinge paththata wedi kihipayak thabamin bimata pathitha wiya.thrasthrawadin wedi thabamin idiriyata ena athara apa saha kandayama issarahata panina gaman ee paththata wedi thabanawa.thawath mitar dahayak ho pahalowak pamana apata welyaya maga harimata athi athara apata wedi thabamin apa pasukara yamata thrasthrawadintada mitar hathalihak ho panahak pamana durak atha yanna asin dutu ma darana mathayayi.welyaya magaharima mage menma apa samagema aramuna wanne thawath pramada wuwahoth welyayema miyadima apata siduwana bawa me wana wita siyallantama awabhodha wi hamaraya.pitupasa balima thawath pramadayata karanakwa atha.dewiyange haskamak nowannata mata kisima dinayaka ema welyayanam tharanaya karannata hakiyawak labenne nathi bawa sak sudak se pahadiliya.ema pihita nowannata mamath mannarama adappan satane miyagiya sesu nilayinge namata athulath wanu noanumanaya.
